comments.body: It doesn't look like `sphinx` is actually used to build the package, so you can remove that. Also, you don't need `hoggorm` and `matplotlib-base` under 'host', just leave them under `run`.

The original package says "setup_requires = Sphinx", so it's needed at the moment for building the package.
But do you have a link where I can best familiarize myself with the topic because then I could make a change request to the original project? Also hoggorm is needed at the moment (otherwise the package fails for linux.)

Yeah, I missed the `version = attr: hoggormplot.__version__` in the `setup.cfg`, which causes the package to be imported when running `setup.py`, so anything needed at import time will need to be included on `host`.
